```{r}
# Use Google font
font_add_google("Lato")
showtext_auto()

# Load and prep the data
data <- read_csv("data/envs 193DS data - Sheet1.csv") %>%
  mutate(
    Date = as.Date(Date),
    WeekType = ifelse(`Week Day (Y/n)` == "Y", "Weekday", "Weekend")
  )
```
